data.title: One account for all apps
data.description: One user account that will let the users connect to all applications on your organization. Supports single sign on (SSO), so that user don't have to re-enter sign-in information on every application. When a user signs out from one application, session is invalidated for all other applications.

data.title: Free and open source
data.description: Oneauth is free for both personal and commercial purposes. TBD.

data.title: TBD
data.description: Logically group tasks with the power of custom checklist groups against a task. Choose between story points or time estimates to plan and track project deliverables. Create your workflow unique for each project.
